verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord reigns,
The Lord reigns;
The Lord reigns,
Let the earth rejoice
Let the earth rejoice
Let the earth rejoice
Let the people be glad
That our God reigns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A fire goes before Him and
Burns up all His enemies;
The hills melt like wax at
The presence of the Lord,
At the presence of the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The heav'ns declare His
Righteousness,
The people see His glory;
For You O Lord, are exalted
Over all the earth
Over all the earth
